programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A couple that took a step back from busy careers to focus on their kids dreams of a layout that works for their family. Drew and Jonathan open up their floor plan to create a kitchen and living room that match the family's needs.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home

programme.desc: After years of neglect, a mountaintop cabin is in desperate need of renovation. Contractor Scott McGillivray and designer Debra Salmoni go all in, turning the rustic cottage into a stunning ski chalet ready to start generating vacation rental income.

programme.title: Vacation House Rules

programme.title: Vacation House Rules
programme.desc: After purchasing her mother's house, a woman realizes she needs this property to be profitable in order to keep it. Scott and Debra transform it into an executive escape that will attract business leaders and vacationers alike.

programme.title: Vacation House Rules
programme.desc: A couple bought a historic fixer upper in a prime vacation area, but they need contractor Scott McGillivray and designer Debra Salmoni's help. There's no time for horsing around while they turn this carriage house into a hip, horse-themed rental home.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple is looking for a historic home in the country with a porch and plenty of green space. Ben and Erin transform their new home into a classic, dogtrot-style house full of historic charm and Southern touches.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A woman wants to downsize and move into town to be closer to friends and work. With her all-in budget of $125,000, she hopes to find a small home with a maintenance-free yard, a master bathroom, and space for her son.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple from Alabama is excited to settle down in a small town for the next phase of their lives. Ben and Erin help them choose a forever home and give it a historic renovation complete with a gorgeous master suite, custom kitchen and screened-in porch.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A Canadian couple looks to purchase a vacation home that will one day become their retirement home. With an all-in budget of $140,000, Ben and Erin show them two Craftsman cottages.

programme.title: Home Town

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple is moving their family of five inland for a new job. They are looking for a large home with architectural details and space for their three kids. Their budget goes a long way as they consider a 5,000-square-foot brick beauty.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A local business owner is looking to buy a starter home within walking distance to town with character, has plenty of space for her dog and fits her thrifty all-in budget.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A young woman whose father died when she was a child inherited her family home, but it has been empty for years. She comes to Ben and Erin to see if the house can be saved with her $120,000 budget or if her money is better spent on another property.

programme.desc: When newlyweds Joe and Olga Connell are gunned down outside their Wilmington, Delaware home, police must investigate a sibling rivalry, a business partnership plagued by drugs, and an outlaw motorcycle gang.

programme.desc: When a woman is found brutally murdered in her home, all signs point to a local troublemaker. But when more bodies start piling up, police realize they may have a serial killer at large - preying on the town's most vulnerable citizens.

programme.title: Hometown Homicide: Local Mysteries

programme.desc: A young soldier in Fort Stewart, GA quits a dangerous militia, but his decision has deadly consequences. Plus, when a cosmetology student in Wenatchee, WA disappears from school and is found dead by a river, no one can believe who killed her.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Viking Stone

programme.title: Secrets Of The Viking Stone

programme.desc: Uncover the source, process and people behind copper, the metal of the digital age, and explore a global mining powerhouse where a spectacular production process yields 250,000 tons of pure copper every year worth over $1.5 billion dollars.

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: A strange, centuries-old labyrinth built into an abandoned quarry was built by an eccentric millionaire, and no one knows why; but now, a new excavation into this mysterious 9,000-foot tunnel system might finally reveal its dark secrets.

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: Residents devised an ingenious trick to keep the location of buried ancient city hidden five stories underground secret from invaders; experts reveal what it was, and using the latest tech, they reveal the truth behind this strange place.

programme.title: Underground Marvels

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: A vast system of tunnels built almost three thousand years ago was the site of the greatest battles of antiquity, and these disorienting passages could be the deadliest weapon in war. Experts reveal what made this underground world so terrifying.

programme.title: Underground Marvels

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: A strange underground system known as the Black Cave is connected to a fairytale castle and was home to an infamous nobleman on the run from the law; today, experts investigate the secrets he left here to discover new parts of this mysterious network.

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: An eerie system of underground vaults in Scotland was once the hideout for thieves who stole newly-buried bodies and sold them; today, experts are excavating these rubble-filled caves to reveal the secrets of what these bandits left behind.

programme.title: Underground Marvels

programme.title: Underground Marvels

programme.title: Underground Marvels

programme.desc: Rebellious teenager Becky is brought on a weekend getaway to a lake house by her father in an effort to reconnect after her mother's death. The trip takes a turn when a group of convicts on the run, suddenly invade the lake house.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A withdrawn teenager uses her telekinetic powers to get revenge on her bullying classmates during senior prom.

programme.title: Trespass Against Us
programme.desc: After an elaborate heist goes south, a reluctant criminal must find a way to escape from the clutches of his fierce outlaw father and the encroaching police.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A man with a porn addiction embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life. Through his interactions with two different women he learns more about life and love than he ever thought possible.

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: Mort Rainey, a writer just coming off of a troublesome divorce with his ex-wife, Amy, finds himself stalked at his remote lake house by a psychotic stranger who claims Mort stole his best story idea.

programme.title: Morris From America
programme.desc: When 13-year-old Morris is moved to Germany by his father, he thinks life can't get any worse. Working on his dream of becoming a rapper, his life is turned around when he meets and falls for Inka. With her help, he learns about himself and his dream.

programme.title: Dr. Strangelove (Or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb)
programme.desc: A mad United States general orders a pre-emptive air strike against the Soviet Union.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: When 16-year-old Max McGrath moves to a new town, he discovers his body can generate the most powerful energy in the universe. A robot named Steel finds him and they discover they form the superhero Max Steel. Together, they must stop an alien invasion.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: After taking a top-secret drug, a writer discovers that he has the ability to use 100 percent of his brain.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: A retired black-ops agent brings his old team back together in an attempt to uncover the assailants that attacked him in his home.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man
programme.desc: Hank, stranded on a desert island, finds a body that washed up on shore. The corpse, named Manny, has the ability to talk and a variety of other supernatural powers. Together, they go on an adventure to bring Hank home and to the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: A welder finds $2 million at the site of a drug exchange near the border. Deciding to keep the money, he soon finds himself being chased by a psychotic killer who also wants the money. The hit man terrorizes his prey while being chased by a sheriff.

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: A financially strapped hitman kidnaps an heiress and later gets trapped in a bad deal.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: After taking a top-secret drug, a writer discovers that he has the ability to use 100 percent of his brain.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: In order to pay for his girlfriend's kidney transplant, an American backpacker is sent on a heist. When it goes wrong, the mob boss demands his death and kidnaps his girlfriend. He must elude his pursuers in a high-speed chase on the German autobahn.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: A Naval officer returning from war joins a cult which helps to clear his head.

programme.desc: A retired black-ops agent brings his old team back together in an attempt to uncover the assailants that attacked him in his home.

programme.title: Scarborough
programme.desc: Two couples take a weekend trip together to explore their illicit relationships.

programme.title: A Fish Called Wanda
programme.desc: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to double-cross each other for the loot. Wanda grows closer to an English lawyer in an attempt to locate the stolen diamonds.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: A gunslinger and his estranged father deal with ruthless land-grabbers who besiege their community.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: An average teenager is shocked when he realizes he can transform himself into a werewolf.

programme.title: Teen Wolf Too
programme.desc: A college-bound teenage werewolf is used to regain the school's excellent boxing record.
Two soldiers’ race across enemy territory to deliver a message that could save lives of 1,600 soldiers.

programme.title: First Reformed
programme.desc: A pastor at a small rural church struggles with guilt over his son's death, an unidentified illness and his dwindling congregation, but when a pregnant woman asks him to help save her disturbed husband he discovers a way to solve all of his problems.

programme.title: Reality Bites
programme.desc: Four friends face the promise and pitfalls of life in the 1990s when they share a house.

programme.title: 28 Days
programme.desc: A woman is ordered to serve time at a rehabilitation clinic after a drunken escapade.

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: Alice, a reclusive writer from Southern England, is entrusted with the care of Frank, a young evacuee from London. As WW II rages across the channel, Frank rekindles suppressed feelings and emotions from Alice's past and the two bond.

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: An acclaimed black pianist hires a white man to be his driver and bodyguard for his tour of the Jim Crow south, and as they set out for the long trip they realize that they have nothing in common, but as the trip goes on they forge a strong bond.

programme.title: Green Room
programme.desc: A punk rock band is trapped backstage after witnessing a murder, and they must use their cunning and cleverness to fight for their lives.

programme.title: True History of the Kelly Gang
programme.desc: Notorious 19th century outlaw Ned Kelly recounts the tales of his life, from his hardscrabble upbringing to his gang's attempts to outrun the authorities.

programme.title: Legally Blonde
programme.desc: When a fashion-driven sorority girl is dumped by her boyfriend, she decides to follow him to law school. Harvard doesn't know what to do when Elle and her dog take the Ivy League institution by storm.

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: After separating from her husband, a mother meets three aspiring filmmakers at a club who have nowhere to live. She invites them to live in her guest house and starts a romance with one of them, a situation that is complicated when her husband shows up.

programme.title: Cold Comes the Night
programme.desc: A dangerous criminal sets out to reclaim his cash package from a corrupt cop. Nearly blind, he kidnaps a struggling motel owner and her young daughter to act as his eyes.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: A former teacher moves back in with his parents after spending time in a mental hospital.

programme.title: The Words
programme.desc: After stealing another man's work, a writer learns the price he must pay.

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: After an activist is murdered in Northern Kenya, a husband searches for the truth about his wife's death.

programme.title: Southside With You
programme.desc: Lawyer Michelle Robinson agrees to go to a community event with a young law firm associate named Barack Obama. On an eventful, day-long date, he attempts to woo her. Throughout the day, they find that they have much more in common than they thought.
